title: Katagami Textile Stencil with Pinwheel Grid and Abstract Floral Design
dimensions:
paper: H. 26.5 x W. 41.6 cm (10 7/16 x 16 3/8 in.)
pattern unit dimensions: H. 20.9 x W. 35.6 cm (8 1/4 x 14 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Museum Collection
medium: Chûban (medium-sized) minogami (mulberry bark paper) treated with persimmon juice and cut using the "kiribori" (drill-carving) and "dôgubori" (punch-carving) techniques

images.copyright: President and Fellows of Harvard College
